text: Aur jo log apne Rubb ki nafarmani se parheiz karte thay unhein giroh dar giroh jannat ki taraf le jaya jaayega yahan tak ke jab woh wahan pahunchenge, aur uske darwaze pehle hi kholay ja chuke hongey, to uske muntazimin unse kahenge ke “Salaam ho tumpar , bahut acche rahey, dakhil ho jao ismein hamesha ke liye”
